title: Stadium Super Trucks: Excellent Madness - /MOMO SlowMo
description:
Jumping, sliding, crashing (gently), who wouldn't want to do that? Robby Gordon wanted to do all of those, in one race.

We love Robby Gordon. 

But that race didn't exist. 


So Robby created his own racing series:  the SPEED Energy Formula Off-Road (AKA "Stadium Super Trucks"), and it's one of the most amazing races ever held for 4-wheeled vehicles. Lap after lap, trucks fly to big heights and round corners in smoky slides, there's bumping and torn body panels and screaming tires. 


But with so much going on, some times it's easy to get overwhelmed, so we're slowing things down, and giving it the /MOMO SlowMo treatment. Now you can savor all 24" of suspension compression, and every smoking second.
